column1: Kata Robata////I came here for the happy hour and was thoroughly impressed.  the happy hour menu is full of interesting rolls and various appetizers
column3: my friends and i ordered all of them.  the rolls were all great; very creative and well presented. the crunchy eel roll was particularly impressive
column4: garnished with multicolored tomiko. and the happy hour prices are a steal. we got out of there cheap
